title: Amadeus : distribution market share 2010 to 2019
summary: Amadeus distribution Amadeus share of the 2019 Market is expected to gradually decline in the coming years to hit a low of 36.7 % in 2010 , a decrease of almost eight % since 2010 .
Despite such forecast downturns within their 2019 segment , Amadeus distribution share total revenue has continued to increase in recent years .

Amadeus distribution Amadeus origins distribution Amadeus , headquartered in New Jersey , operates over 200 subsidiary companies in 60 countries within the pharmaceutical , medical devices and consumer healthcare segments .
gold: This statistic shows the Amadeus distribution platform market share of global air travel distribution systems from 2010 to 2019 . In 2019 , the Amadeus held 44 percent of the global air travel distribution systems market . In 2019 , the revenue of Amadeus was 6.25 billion U.S. dollars .
